vendor_name.reason: No prominent vendor/supplier name or header block visible on the document. Top-right shows only the document title 'INVOICE'; left column contains 'ISSUED TO' (customer) and 'PAY TO' (bank), not a vendor name.

vendor_address.reason: No vendor postal address block detected. The only address-like block under 'ISSUED TO' corresponds to the customer; no separate vendor address is present.

vendor_phone.reason: No phone number string present in the visible document header or contact blocks.

vendor_email.reason: No email address text visible in the document.

vendor_website.reason: No website or domain-like text visible tied to a vendor block.

customer_name.reason: Text under the 'ISSUED TO:' label in the left column shows 'Richard Sanchez' as the billed party name; visual grouping and label 'ISSUED TO' indicate this is the customer name.

customer_address.value:
Thynk Unlimited
123 Anywhere St., Any City
customer_address.normalized_value:
Thynk Unlimited
123 Anywhere St., Any City
customer_address.reason: Lines immediately under the customer name in the 'ISSUED TO' block read 'Thynk Unlimited' and '123 Anywhere St., Any City' which correspond to the customer's organization and postal address (multi-line address block).

invoice_number.reason: Right column labeled 'INVOICE NO:' contains the short identifier '01234' aligned with invoice metadata.

invoice_date.reason: Right-column invoice metadata shows 'DATE: 11.02.2030'. Interpreted as DD.MM.YYYY and normalized to ISO-8601 (2030-02-11).

due_date.reason: Right-column invoice metadata shows 'DUE DATE: 11.03.2030'. Interpreted as DD.MM.YYYY and normalized to ISO-8601 (2030-03-11).

terms.reason: No explicit 'Terms' or payment terms text is visible in the invoice details area.

line_items.reason: Tabular area with headers 'DESCRIPTION', 'UNIT PRICE', 'QTY', 'TOTAL' and six repeated rows. Each row's description text, unit price (100), qty (1) and right-most total ($100) were visually aligned under the respective column headers. Normalized numeric values remove currency symbol and convert quantities to numbers.

line_item_description.reason: Multiple description entries exist in the line_items array (see line_items field). This field is left null to avoid duplicating per-row values.

line_item_quantity.reason: Quantity is provided per-line in the line_items array (each row shows '1'). The aggregate per-row quantities are captured in the line_items array; this single-value field is left null for the same reason.

line_item_unit_price.reason: Unit price values are provided per-line in the line_items array (each row shows '100'). The per-row values are captured in the array; the single-value field is left null to avoid misrepresentation.

line_item_total.reason: Line totals are provided per-line in the line_items array ('$100' each). The aggregated per-row values are captured in the line_items array; this single-value field is left null to avoid duplication.

pay_to.reason: Left-column block labeled 'PAY TO:' contains 'Borcele Bank' indicating the payment destination / payee bank.

bank_account_name.reason: Under 'PAY TO' the line 'Account Name: Adeline Palmerston' clearly indicates the account name for remittance.

bank_account_number.reason: Under 'PAY TO' the line 'Account No.: 0123 4567 8901' provides the account number. Normalized value removes internal spacing to present an uninterrupted numeric account identifier.

subtotal.reason: Right-side totals area shows 'SUBTOTAL' with the monetary value '$400' aligned to the right of the table; normalized to numeric 400 (currency symbol captured separately).

discount.reason: No explicit 'Discount' or deduction line is visible in the totals area.

tax_rate.reason: Totals area lists 'Tax 10%'. Captured as displayed string and normalized to numeric rate 0.10 (10 percent).

tax_amount.reason: A tax percentage is shown ('10%') but the document does not explicitly print a separate tax monetary line (only 'Tax 10%' label and the final TOTAL). To avoid inventing a value, tax amount is left null.

total.reason: Final emphasized line reads 'TOTAL' with value '$440' in the totals area; normalized numeric value is 440.

currency.reason: Monetary values throughout the document use the dollar sign '$' (e.g., '$100', '$400', '$440'); currency symbol recorded as displayed.

document_title.reason: Large top-right text reads 'INVOICE' indicating document type; normalized capitalization to 'Invoice'.

notes.reason: No additional free-form notes, payment instructions beyond the 'PAY TO' block, or small-print notes visible in the cropped document image.

layout_region.value: title: top-right; issued-to/pay-to: left; invoice metadata: right; line-items: center; totals: bottom-right
layout_region.reason: Visual grouping: title is top-right, the 'ISSUED TO' and 'PAY TO' blocks occupy the left column, invoice number/date/due date are in the right column near the top, the tabular line-items occupy the central area, and totals appear bottom-right.
